sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog v-model="dialogDelete" max-width="500px">
        <v-card>
            <v-card-title class="text-h5">Хотите удалить заявку?</v-card-title>
            <v-card-actions>
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="closeDelete">Отмена</v-btn>
                <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="deleteItemConfirm">Да</v-btn>
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>

export default {
    props: {
        dialogDelete: Boolean,
        value: {
            type: Boolean,
            default: false,
        }
    },
    computed: {
        dialogDelete: {
            get() {
                return this.value;
            },
            set(val) {
                this.$emit('input', val);
            },
        },
    },
    methods: {
        closeDelete() {
            this.$emit('close-delete');
        },
        deleteItemConfirm() {
            this.$emit('confirm-delete');
            this.dialogDelete = false; // Закрывает диалог после подтверждения удаления
        },
        confirmDelete() {
            this.$emit('confirm-delete');
            this.dialogDelete = false;
        },
        cancelDelete() {
            this.$emit('cancel-delete');
            this.dialogDelete = false;
        },
    },
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
